jpo
Class PictureInfo

java.lang.Object
  jpo.PictureInfo
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class PictureInfo
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

Objects of this type represent a single picture in the collection. Since SortableDefaultMutableTreeNodes allow user obects to be attached to the node this is a conveinent place to store all the information that we have about a picture.

The class provides several convenience methods to access the information.

This class must implement the Serializable interface or Drag and Drop will not work.

See Also:
GroupInfo, Serialized Form

Method Detail

toString

public java.lang.String toString()
returns the description of the image in the default toString method.

dumpToXml

public void dumpToXml(java.io.BufferedWriter out)
               throws java.io.IOException
this method writes all attributes of the picture in the JPO xml data format.

Parameters:
out - The Bufferer Writer receiving the xml data
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if there is a drama writing the file.

dumpToXml

public void dumpToXml(java.io.BufferedWriter out,
                      java.lang.String highres,
                      java.lang.String lowres)
               throws java.io.IOException
this method writes all attributes of the picture in the JPO xml data format with the highres and lowres locations passed in as parameters. This became nescesary because when the XmlDistiller copies the pictures to a new location we don't want to write the URLs of the original pictures whilst all other attributes are retained.

Parameters:
out - The Bufferer Writer receiving the xml data
highres - The URL of the highres file
lowres - The URL of the lowres file
Throws:
java.io.IOException - If there was an IO error

descriptionContains

public boolean descriptionContains(java.lang.String searchString)
Checks whether the searchString parameter is contained in the description. The search is case insensitive.

Parameters:
searchString - The string to search for.
Returns:
true if found. false if not.

removePictureInfoChangeListener

public void removePictureInfoChangeListener(PictureInfoChangeListener listener)
Method to register the listening object of the status events. Will NOT throw an exception if the listener was not in the Vector.

Parameters:
listener - The listener that doesn't want to notifications any more.

sendPictureInfoChangedEvent

private void sendPictureInfoChangedEvent(PictureInfoChangeEvent pce)
Send PictureInfoChangeEvents.

Parameters:
pce - The Event we want to notify.

anyMatch

public boolean anyMatch(java.lang.String searchString)
Checks whether the searchString parameter is contained in any of the fields. It doesn't check the checksum, lowres filename, rotation. It does chech te description, highres name, film reference, creation time, comment and copyright holder

Parameters:
searchString - The string to search for.
Returns:
true if found. false if not.
